# The `DWARFLocationExpression` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Represents a single DWARF expression, whose value is location-dependent.

Typically used in DW&#95;AT&#95;location attributes to describe the location of objects.

Definition at line 21 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflocationexpression-h">DWARFLocationExpression.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition

The expression itself.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflocationexpression-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflocationexpression-h">DWARFLocationExpression.h</a>.

### Range {#a7d93de8d3e69ad8bf87212ffeabcd86b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;DWARFAddressRange&gt; llvm::DWARFLocationExpression::Range</>}>
The address range in which this expression is valid.

std::nullopt denotes a default entry which is valid in addresses not covered by other location expressions, or everywhere if there are no other expressions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflocationexpression-h/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflocationexpression-h">DWARFLocationExpression.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
